title: An Act prohibiting the practice of coal rolling

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Murray of Milford, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3746) of Brian W. Murray and Kristin E. Kassner for legislation to establish a penalty for the retrofitting of certain diesel-powered vehicles with alternate emission devices.  Transportation.
